content: Fungal infection: Common symptoms include dischromic _patches, itching, nodal_skin_eruptions, skin_rash. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
Allergy: Common symptoms include chills, continuous_sneezing, shivering, watering_from_eyes. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

GERD: Common symptoms include acidity, chest_pain, cough, stomach_pain, ulcers_on_tongue, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Chronic cholestasis: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, itching, loss_of_appetite, nausea, vomiting, yellowing_of_eyes, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Drug Reaction: Common symptoms include burning_micturition, itching, skin_rash, spotting_ urination, stomach_pain. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Peptic ulcer diseae: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, indigestion, internal_itching, loss_of_appetite, passage_of_gases, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

AIDS: Common symptoms include extra_marital_contacts, high_fever, muscle_wasting, patches_in_throat. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Diabetes : Common symptoms include blurred_and_distorted_vision, excessive_hunger, fatigue, increased_appetite, irregular_sugar_level, lethargy, obesity, polyuria, restlessness, weight_loss. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
Gastroenteritis: Common symptoms include dehydration, diarrhoea, sunken_eyes, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Bronchial Asthma: Common symptoms include breathlessness, cough, family_history, fatigue, high_fever, mucoid_sputum. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hypertension : Common symptoms include chest_pain, dizziness, headache, lack_of_concentration, loss_of_balance. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Migraine: Common symptoms include acidity, blurred_and_distorted_vision, depression, excessive_hunger, headache, indigestion, irritability, stiff_neck, visual_disturbances. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Cervical spondylosis: Common symptoms include back_pain, dizziness, loss_of_balance, neck_pain, weakness_in_limbs. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Paralysis (brain hemorrhage): Common symptoms include altered_sensorium, headache, vomiting, weakness_of_one_body_side. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Jaundice: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, dark_urine, fatigue, high_fever, itching, vomiting, weight_loss, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Malaria: Common symptoms include chills, diarrhoea, headache, high_fever, muscle_pain, nausea, sweating, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Chicken pox: Common symptoms include fatigue, headache, high_fever, itching, lethargy, loss_of_appetite, malaise, mild_fever, red_spots_over_body, skin_rash, swelled_lymph_nodes. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Dengue: Common symptoms include back_pain, chills, fatigue, headache, high_fever, joint_pain, loss_of_appetite, malaise, muscle_pain, nausea, pain_behind_the_eyes, red_spots_over_body, skin_rash, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Typhoid: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, belly_pain, chills, constipation, diarrhoea, fatigue, headache, high_fever, nausea, toxic_look_(typhos), vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

hepatitis A: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, dark_urine, diarrhoea, joint_pain, loss_of_appetite, mild_fever, muscle_pain, nausea, vomiting, yellowing_of_eyes, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hepatitis B: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, dark_urine, fatigue, itching, lethargy, loss_of_appetite, malaise, receiving_blood_transfusion, receiving_unsterile_injections, yellow_urine, yellowing_of_eyes, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hepatitis C: Common symptoms include family_history, fatigue, loss_of_appetite, nausea, yellowing_of_eyes, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hepatitis D: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, dark_urine, fatigue, joint_pain, loss_of_appetite, nausea, vomiting, yellowing_of_eyes, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hepatitis E: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, acute_liver_failure, coma, dark_urine, fatigue, high_fever, joint_pain, loss_of_appetite, nausea, stomach_bleeding, vomiting, yellowing_of_eyes, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Alcoholic hepatitis: Common symptoms include abdominal_pain, distention_of_abdomen, fluid_overload, history_of_alcohol_consumption, swelling_of_stomach, vomiting, yellowish_skin. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Tuberculosis: Common symptoms include blood_in_sputum, breathlessness, chest_pain, chills, cough, fatigue, high_fever, loss_of_appetite, malaise, mild_fever, phlegm, sweating, swelled_lymph_nodes, vomiting, weight_loss, yellowing_of_eyes. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Common Cold: Common symptoms include chest_pain, chills, congestion, continuous_sneezing, cough, fatigue, headache, high_fever, loss_of_smell, malaise, muscle_pain, phlegm, redness_of_eyes, runny_nose, sinus_pressure, swelled_lymph_nodes, throat_irritation. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Pneumonia: Common symptoms include breathlessness, chest_pain, chills, cough, fast_heart_rate, fatigue, high_fever, malaise, phlegm, rusty_sputum, sweating. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Dimorphic hemmorhoids(piles): Common symptoms include bloody_stool, constipation, irritation_in_anus, pain_during_bowel_movements, pain_in_anal_region. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
Heart attack: Common symptoms include breathlessness, chest_pain, sweating, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Varicose veins: Common symptoms include bruising, cramps, fatigue, obesity, prominent_veins_on_calf, swollen_blood_vessels, swollen_legs. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hypothyroidism: Common symptoms include abnormal_menstruation, brittle_nails, cold_hands_and_feets, depression, dizziness, enlarged_thyroid, fatigue, irritability, lethargy, mood_swings, puffy_face_and_eyes, swollen_extremeties, weight_gain. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hyperthyroidism: Common symptoms include abnormal_menstruation, diarrhoea, excessive_hunger, fast_heart_rate, fatigue, irritability, mood_swings, muscle_weakness, restlessness, sweating, weight_loss. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Hypoglycemia: Common symptoms include anxiety, blurred_and_distorted_vision, drying_and_tingling_lips, excessive_hunger, fatigue, headache, irritability, nausea, palpitations, slurred_speech, sweating, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Osteoarthristis: Common symptoms include hip_joint_pain, joint_pain, knee_pain, neck_pain, painful_walking, swelling_joints. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Arthritis: Common symptoms include movement_stiffness, muscle_weakness, painful_walking, stiff_neck, swelling_joints. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

(vertigo) Paroymsal  Positional Vertigo: Common symptoms include headache, loss_of_balance, nausea, spinning_movements, unsteadiness, vomiting. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
Acne: Common symptoms include blackheads, pus_filled_pimples, scurring, skin_rash. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Urinary tract infection: Common symptoms include bladder_discomfort, burning_micturition, continuous_feel_of_urine, foul_smell_of urine. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Psoriasis: Common symptoms include inflammatory_nails, joint_pain, silver_like_dusting, skin_peeling, skin_rash, small_dents_in_nails. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.

Impetigo: Common symptoms include blister, high_fever, red_sore_around_nose, skin_rash, yellow_crust_ooze. If you experience these symptoms, consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
